PHRASE.LANG: Nobody will have realized the danger we will all have been in, but now you will have been able to warn them. Maybe you will have been able to at least save the French resistance.[#Legal]
Personne ne l'aurez compris le danger que nous aurons tous été, mais maintenant vous avez été en mesure de les prévenir. Peut-être que vous aurez pu au moins sauver la résistance française.[#Legal]
Nobody will have realized the danger we will all have been in, but now you will have been able to warn them. Maybe you will have been able to at least save the French resistance.[#Legal]
